trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for a control where the design surface must use a preview of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 在視覺化設計工具中，為設計介面必須使用相關聯控制項之預覽的控制項提供設計階段支援。

trans-unit.source: The only distinction between the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PreviewControlDesigner" /> class and the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner" /> class is that the design host always displays a preview of the control and any modifications that are made in Design view are applied only to the preview of the control.
trans-unit.target: 之間唯一的差別<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PreviewControlDesigner" />類別和<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner" />類別是設計主應用程式一律會顯示控制項的預覽，並在 [設計] 檢視中進行任何修改只會套用至控制項的預覽。

trans-unit.source: Your code must specifically persist changes to the control.
trans-unit.target: 您的程式碼必須特別保存控制項的變更。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PreviewControlDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.PreviewControlDesigner" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the control designer uses a temporary preview control to generate the design-time HTML markup.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，其中該值會表示控制項設計工具是否使用暫時預覽控制項以產生設計階段 HTML 標記。
